```{r}
survey <- read_excel("Egyetemistak elkepzelesei a jovo munkahelyerol-adat-2020-04-16.xlsx")
```

# General cleaning

```{r}
survey <- survey[-(duplicated(survey[2]) == T) * (is.na(survey[2]) == F)*seq(nrow(survey)),] %>% select_if(~sum(!is.na(.)) > 0) %>%
  .[,] %>% select(-c(1,2))
```

```{r}
df_names <- data.frame(new_names = str_c("v", seq_along(survey)), "original_names" = names(survey) %>% str_split("\\. ") %>% sapply("[",2))
names(survey) <- str_c("v", seq_along(survey))

df_names$original_names <- as.vector(df_names$original_names)

df_names[98,2] <- "Mostanában milyen gyakran érezte magát magányosnak?"
```

# Remove outliers

```{r}
survey <- survey_W_outliers %>% mutate(
  v59 = ifelse(
    
  )
    quantile(v59, probs=.25, na.rm = T) - 1.5 * IQR(v59, na.rm = T)
)
  

x <- ozone$pressure_height
qnt <- quantile(x, probs=c(.25, .75), na.rm = T)
caps <- quantile(x, probs=c(.05, .95), na.rm = T)
H <- 1.5 * IQR(x, na.rm = T)
x[x < (qnt[1] - H)] <- caps[1]
x[x > (qnt[2] + H)] <- caps[2]

```
